name: simple-taiwanese
0:
”Alexa open Simple Taiwanese”
”Alexa ask Simple Taiwanese to say 'Hello' in Taiwanese”
”Alexa ask Simple Taiwanese how to say 'Goodbye'”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple taiwanese
des: Learn how to say basic Taiwanese phrases. You can simply launch the skill to learn how to say a random phrase in Taiwanese. Or you can ask the skill how to say a specific (common) phrase in Taiwanese.
